short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Side Trakt, a chrome extension for Trakt.tv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side-trakt is a powerful Chrome extension designed to seamlessly access your trakt.tv collections and lists. With Side-trakt, you can effortlessly browse, track, and manage your favorite shows and movies directly from your web browser.

Whether you're exploring new content, tracking your progress, or updating your history, Side-trakt allows you to consult, mark as watched, or add to your collection with just a few clicks.

Side-trakt is a free and open-source project developed by a single individual. Please consider making a small donation, leaving a review in the web store, contributing to the code base, or providing feedback by reporting issues or suggesting new features on GitHub.

Your support, be it through donations, reviews, or feedback, is deeply appreciated and significantly aids in the improvement of the application

Please consider supporting the development of trakt.tv and/or tmdb as well as they play vital roles in this extension's functionality.

Support the developpment at : https://paypal.me/dvcol/5
